title: Pineapple Girl
description: THEY SEEMED FATED TO MEET!It was a pineapple given to her by a grateful patient that led Eloise Bennett to meeting the Dutch doctor Timon van Zeilst. Shortly after that, Eloise went to Holland to nurse a patient and there was Dr. van Zeilst again! Thrown into his company, Eloise soon realized that she loved him. But Timon was going to marry the beautiful Liskeâ€”so why would he look twice at Eloise?Betty Neels: She is renowned around the globe for sweet stories in which love triumphs over all. This popularity has made Betty Neels the top-selling Harlequin Romance author of all time, with her earlier novels in greater demand than ever! These four novels--available for the first time in retail--will be cherished among readers and collectors alike.
author: Betty Neels
